ca.ualberta.taskr

Class MyBidsActivity

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.MyBidsActivity

  • public class MyBidsActivity

    Displays a list of all tasks the current user has bidded on. Tasks are only displayed if they are not ASSIGNED or DONE, and displayed tasks can be clicked to open a class ViewTaskActivity for that task.

    See Also:
    class ViewTaskActivity

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      RecyclerView displaying list of tasks bidded on by user.
      android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout myBidsRefresh
      SwipeRefreshLayout for refreshing bidded task list.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

        Initializes all views including toolbar and RecyclerView for task list. Sets listener for task list that starts class ViewTaskActivity for the clicked task and sets the refresh listener to repopulate the task list on refresh.
